titleInfo.title: Richie McDonald at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum

mods.abstract: One color window card (brown on tan) announcing Richie McDonald at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on March 25. Poster features woodcuts of a guitar and equipment.
